articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Israeli study finds 94% drop in symptomatic COVID-19 cases with Pfizer vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: Israel's largest healthcare provider on Sunday reported a 94% drop in symptomatic COVID-19 infections among 600,000 people who received two doses of the Pfizer's vaccine in the country's biggest study to date.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
